fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level passthrough of [DeptID]; convert to a calculated column and map the column reference to 'HR Dataset'[DeptID].

fixes.name: dep calc 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Row-level multiplication of dep calc 1 and MarriedID; convert to a calculated column and update references to 'HR Dataset'[dep calc 1] and 'HR Dataset'[MarriedID].
